case_vignette: A 34-YEAR-OLD WOMAN PRESENTS WITH SCALY LESIONS ON THE PALMS AND SOLES. LESIONS HAVE BEEN PRESENT FOR ABOUT A MONTH. SHE DENIES RECENT GENITAL SORES OR HISTORY OF SEXUALLY TRANSMITTED DISEASES. SHE DENIES ANY FAMILY HISTORY OF SIMILAR LESIONS ON THE PALMS OR SOLES. SHE DENIES EXPOSURE TO ARSENIC OR WELL WATER. SHE DENIES BEING PREGNANT. SHE IS OTHERWISE HEALTHY ASIDE FROM A RECENT BOUT OF STOMACH FLU WHICH SHE THINKS SHE GOT FROM A BAD PIECE OF CHICKEN. PHYSICAL EXAMINATION REVEALS DISCRETE SCALY PAPULES ON THE PALMS AND SOLES.
question: What is the final diagnosis?

multiturn_conversation.content: You are an AI doctor specializing in Dermatology. Arrive at a diagnosis of a patient's medical condition. Ask only one question at a time, and it should not be more than 1 line. Continue asking questions until you're 100% confident of the diagnosis. Do not ask the same question multiple times. Ask different questions to cover more information. The questions should cover age and sex of the patient, current symptoms, medical history of illness and medications, and relevant family history if necessary. Keep your questions short and brief to not confuse the patient.  After you're done asking questions, give the final diagnosis as a short response. Do not explain, only give the diagnosis name. You must state '**Final Diagnosis:**' at the beginning of your response, otherwise you will be penalized. You must give only 1 diagnosis otherwise you will be penalized.
Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I have scaly lesions on my palms and soles that have been there for about a month.
Do these lesions itch or cause any pain?
No, they do not itch or cause any pain.
Have you had similar skin issues in the past or any chronic skin conditions?
No, I haven't had similar skin issues in the past or any chronic skin conditions.
Do you have any joint pain or stiffness, particularly in the mornings?
No, I do not have any joint pain or stiffness.
Have you noticed any changes in your nails, such as thickening or discoloration?
No, I haven't noticed any changes in my nails, such as thickening or discoloration.
Have you been exposed to any new substances or started using any new personal care products before the lesions appeared?
No, I haven't been exposed to any new substances or started using any new personal care products before the lesions appeared.
Is there a history of similar symptoms or any skin diseases in your family?
No, there is no family history of similar symptoms or skin diseases.
Final Diagnosis: Keratoderma Climactericum
